shapes

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Circle

  • public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a circle. Every circle created using this class has a positive radius.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Circle()
      Creates a circle with a radius of 1.0.
      Circle(double rad)
      Creates a circle with the specified radius.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object anObject)
      Compares this circle to the specified object.
      double getArea()
      Calculates the area of this circle as a double.
      double getCircumference()
      Calculates the circumference of this circle as a double.
      double getRadius()
      Used to get the radius of the circle, which will be a positive number.
      void setRadius(double rad)
      Sets the radius of the circle to the specified radius.
      java.lang.String toString()
      A String representation of this circle.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Circle

        public Circle()
        Creates a circle with a radius of 1.0.

      • Circle

        public Circle(double rad)
        Creates a circle with the specified radius.
        Parameters:
        rad - The radius of the new circle. This should be a positive number.

    • Method Detail

      • setRadius

        public void setRadius(double rad)
        Sets the radius of the circle to the specified radius.
        Parameters:
        rad - the proposed new radius. This should be a positive number.

      • getRadius

        public double getRadius()
        Used to get the radius of the circle, which will be a positive number.
        Returns:
        the radius of the circle.

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Calculates the area of this circle as a double.
        Returns:
        the area of the circle.

      • getCircumference

        public double getCircumference()
        Calculates the circumference of this circle as a double.
        Returns:
        the circumference of the circle.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object anObject)
        Compares this circle to the specified object. The result is true if and only if the argument is not null and is a Circle object with the same radius as this object.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        true if the given object represents a Circle with the same radius as this one, false otherwise.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        A String representation of this circle. This is in the form "circle with radius r", where r is the double representing the radius of the circle to the nearest hundredth.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String representation of this circle.
